trends: There have been no other sightings in Ringgold
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Extremly brightly lit from the inside almost a row of windows w/ dividers between them
divs: sighting detailswhile riding my motorcycle way out a country rd very few homes or other buildings crossing a lg clearcut along east side of highway i am on top of lg hill going north on hwy 792 over looking a valley a mile or mabey a little more across 800 or 1000 yds away suspended appr. 500 feet above ground level in the valley but not much higher than the hill i was on there was a row what looked like a row of windows lit w\ extremly bright lights w\ dividers between them (it kinda looked like the cabin on the bottom of the blimb but much larger) 5 windows 4 dividers i thought what is that so i stopped and watched for mabey 5 min it remained in place the whole time after 5 min of watching i decided that has to be a ufo (i did not say aliens i said unidentified flying object) so i went home i told a few friends who all said that only proves your nuts
